Summary: Bright Neon Green light looked like a shooting star
divs: Sighting DetailsI was on Harwood Road headed east (Laytonville Ca) then I turned the car south at the intersection "Harwood road and hwy 101" the time was 7:30 pm. I noticed when I was turning a bright light that looked like a shooting star but it was really big and neon green, it seemed to get bigger as it got closer. It then went past over mountains and I could no longer see it. The object seemed to be heading north, It looked like it would hit the ground somewhere but I could not see it once it went over the mountains.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Laytonville
There were no other sightings in Laytonville on or around August 26th 2008
